recipes.title: Chicken Biriyani
recipes.description: A mixed rice dish popular in South Asia.
directions: Heat up oil and fry onions until golden brown.
Marinate chicken with spices, yogurt, and fried onions.
Cook on medium heat until done.

recipes.title: Grilled Fish
recipes.description: A healthy and flavorful fish dish.
directions: Marinate the fish with lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and herbs.
Preheat the grill to medium heat.
Grill the fish for 5-7 minutes on each side.

recipes.title: Mutton Curry
recipes.description: A rich and spicy curry made with tender mutton.
directions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices.
Add mutton and cook until tender.

recipes.title: Prawn Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and delicious stir-fried prawn recipe.
directions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add prawns and stir fry for 3-5 minutes.
Add bell peppers and soy sauce, then cook for 5 more minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken dish.
directions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked.
Cook tomato puree with spices, then add grilled chicken and cream.
